<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/container-svc/containers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List containers.

Requires the `container-svc:container:view` permission.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"containerId":{"type":"string"},"limit":{"type":"integer"},"nodeId":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}},"description":"List Containers Request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

irrelevant.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"labels":{"additionalProperties":{"type":"string"},"description":"Labels are metadata tags assigned to the
